data.name: Blockdown
data.detailed_description:
Roll your cube to get to the goal, but think before rolling! Sometimes you need to stand on a switch to raise a drawbridge and reach the goal, as seen below.



In some levels you can morph into a different shape that lets you move exactly one tile at a time, but at the cost of not being able to stand up. In this mode, the only way you can change orientation is by moving across a bridge.



You can also move your player from one side of the tile to the other, perhaps by traversing a Mobiüs strip. It's a topologist's dream! (or nightmare)
data.about_the_game:
Roll your cube to get to the goal, but think before rolling! Sometimes you need to stand on a switch to raise a drawbridge and reach the goal, as seen below.



In some levels you can morph into a different shape that lets you move exactly one tile at a time, but at the cost of not being able to stand up. In this mode, the only way you can change orientation is by moving across a bridge.



You can also move your player from one side of the tile to the other, perhaps by traversing a Mobiüs strip. It's a topologist's dream! (or nightmare)
data.short_description: Roll around on a wibbly wobbly grid through space. This peaceful puzzler is a 3D twist on a classic 2D game.
